Method new()

Change current position.

Default actions on reset pipeline or process.

Set widgets of all screens to their default values.

Gives the name of the status corresponding to the code (integer).

Returns the date and time in timestamp UNIX format.

xxx

Return the UI for a modal dialog with data selection input. If 'failed' is TRUE, then display a message that the previous value was invalid.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

ScreenManager$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
